#summary Projects using the NVIDIA Texture Tools.
#labels Featured

The [http://developer.nvidia.com/object/texture_tools.html NVIDIA Texture Tools] are being used by many game production pipelines and other projects. Here are brief descriptions of some of them. If you know about any other project or studio using the NVIDIA Texture Tools that is not listed here, please [http://groups.google.com/group/nvidia-texture-tools let us know]!

[http://forum.celestialmatters.org/viewtopic.php?t=273 F-TexTools 2.0 / NmTools 2.0], _Fridger Schrempp, Robert Skuridin_

Cross-platform tools optimized for accurate processing of huge scientific imaging data on regular computers, and generate textures that can be visualized in [http://www.shatters.net/celestia/ Celestia], a free space simulation that lets you explore our universe in three dimensions.

[http://www.blender.org Blender], _Amorilia_ 

Blender is an open source, cross platform suite of tools for 3D creation. Blender uses the NVIDIA Texture Tool's source code for loading DDS textures since version 2.46.
